amendment.description: An amendment numbered 10 printed in the Congressional Record to add a new paragraph within section 2 titled "Environmental Reviews".

action.text: Mr. Johnson (OH) raised a point of order against the Tlaib amendment (A016). Mr. Johnson stated that the provisions of the amendment exceeds the scope of the bill and the amendment is therefore, not germane. The Chair sustained the point of order.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A016) offered by Ms. Tlaib.
